description.raw:
On Windows, the configure.bat-based build process passes all the ignition-math variables directly to the CMake call. However also the classical find_package(ignition-math2) works perfectly on Windows, if ign-math2 has been installed to a default directory or if its installation directory has been added to CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH or ignition-math2_DIR . This commit adds support for using ignition-math2 as a "normal" cmake package, retaining support for the configure.bat-based build process.

Remake of #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-msgs/pull-requests/20/fix-find_package-ignition-math2-on-windows/diff that just copies logic from the `sdformat` repo.
